page.title: 13A Typical Weekend
page.content: Our family wakes up at about 9.00am to 9.30am.My mum normally goes out into the garden for 1 to 2 hours so we have to make our own breakfast.My dad feeds the hens and his pheasant chicks.Me and my brother watch television for about an hour. When my dad has finished he normally sits down and watches television with us.Sometimes he shouts my mum in to make his breakfast.We usually sit around and listen to the radio . At about a quarter past twelve my mum starts making our dinner.Then we have it when we are ready to eat.I go outside at about 1pm to play football.My mum goes back out again into the garden. After a bit of playing football I collect the eggs from our hens.From 6pm onwards we all stay inside and watch TV until 10.30 when I go to bed.
